title: Intimate Health & Sexual Wellness
description: Discreet regenerative treatments that restore pelvic health, sexual confidence, and overall intimate wellbeing.
longDescription: Intimate wellness deserves the same level of medical excellence as every other part of your health. At Dr. SNA Clinic we combine regenerative medicine, urology expertise, and compassionate care to treat sensitive concerns for both men and women. Every appointment is led by a GMC-registered doctor in private suites, with protocols designed to protect your dignity while delivering proven results.

seo.metaTitle: Intimate Health Clinic London | Men's & Women's Sexual Wellness | Dr. SNA
seo.metaDescription: Explore discreet male and female intimate health treatments in London. P-Shot, shockwave therapy, PRP, pelvic rejuvenation & more with Dr. SNA Clinic.

hero.headline: World-Class Intimate Health Care
hero.subheadline: Doctor-led regenerative treatments that help you feel confident in your body again

featured.title: Your Intimate Health Matters. So Does Your Dignity.
paragraphs: Intimacy is the foundation of connection—with yourself, your partner, and life itself. When intimate health challenges arise, they can silently erode confidence, strain relationships, and diminish joy. You deserve expert care delivered with the compassion and discretion this deeply personal aspect of your wellbeing requires.

At Dr SNA Clinic, we understand that seeking help takes courage. That's why Dr Syed Nadeem Abbas personally leads every consultation, combining advanced regenerative medicine with genuine empathy to restore not just function, but confidence, comfort, and the freedom to feel like yourself again.

features.title: Compassionate Expertise
features.description: Doctor-led care that treats you as a whole person, not just a condition

features.title: Complete Discretion
features.description: Private suites, confidential consultations, and judgment-free support

introduction.title: Specialist Care for Sensitive Concerns
introduction.content: Intimate issues can affect confidence, relationships, and quality of life. We make it easy to seek help with calm clinical spaces, discreet scheduling, and evidence-based treatments that focus on regeneration rather than masking symptoms.

highlights.description: PRP, shockwave, and cellular therapies proven to restore healthy function

subcategories.title: Men's Intimate Health
subcategories.shortDescription: Performance, recovery, and penile regenerative medicine
subcategories.description: Restore confidence with P-Shot PRP, focused shockwave therapy, Peyronie's correction, and inflammation control for conditions like lichen sclerosus.

subcategories.title: Female Intimate Health
subcategories.shortDescription: Pelvic floor, hormonal, and sensual rejuvenation
subcategories.description: Natural PRP shots, Ultra Femme 360, and EMSELLA pelvic floor therapy to improve lubrication, support, and confidence at every life stage.

steps.title: Private consultation
steps.description: Dedicated 45-minute appointment to discuss symptoms, lifestyle goals, and medical history.

steps.title: Advanced diagnostics
steps.description: Hormone labs, Doppler imaging, or pelvic assessment to understand root causes.

steps.title: Tailored treatment plan
steps.description: Blends regenerative injectables, device therapy, and supplements matched to your biology.

steps.title: Concierge aftercare
steps.description: Follow-ups, symptom tracking, and direct access to your doctor for reassurance.

testimonials.name: James P.
testimonials.text: The team treated a sensitive subject with total professionalism. Within weeks my performance anxiety disappeared and I feel like myself again.

testimonials.name: Samantha R.
testimonials.text: Dr. Abbas explained every step and tailored treatment around my postnatal concerns. Sensitivity, lubrication, and confidence improved dramatically.

testimonials.name: Omar L.
testimonials.text: After only two visits I understood what was happening and had a structured plan. The curvature reduced and discomfort is gone.

faq.question: Will anyone know I'm visiting the clinic?
faq.answer: We use discreet scheduling, neutral calendar entries, and private check-in. No shared waiting rooms—you're taken directly to a consultation suite.

faq.question: Are treatments painful?
faq.answer: Most procedures use topical numbing, nerve blocks, or vibration techniques. Sensations are mild and last only a few minutes.

faq.question: How soon will I see results?
faq.answer: Shockwave and neuromodulator treatments can improve function within weeks, while regenerative PRP builds steadily over 6-12 weeks.

faq.question: Is financing available?
faq.answer: Yes. We partner with medical finance providers for 0% plans up to 12 months and extended terms on request.

cta.title: Ready to Feel Like Yourself Again?
cta.subtitle: Book a confidential consultation with Dr. Abbas and get a personalised roadmap back to confidence.
cta.note: Consultation fee (£100) is redeemable against treatment.
